Quickstrike




Quickstrike sat at the bridge, watching the few montiors. He waited 
patiently for Black Arachnia to return with a report of a conference. 
He wasn't informed of what it was, but he knew she could handle it. 

He looked around the room for a moment. He remembered he was 
restricted to this place because of his mischief he usually caused. 
He was shot at twice for being in here. It dealt with reprograming 
the computer. The shot on the leg was the worst on him. 

He twitched a few long didgits on his left so-called hand. He paused 
for a moment, then reached behind his armor and brought out a disk. 
It was the disk with the information of the Dark Side on it. He 
chuckled. He still had it. 

He put it back and waited further.
